data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Bolivar, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bolivar, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Bolivar who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary: On average, 30 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Bolivar, Ecuador.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Bolivar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 19,410 believers in the state of Bolivar to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Bolivar, Ecuador to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Bolivar prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Bolivar, Ecuador be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bolivar, Ecuador has a population of 183,600.

We estimate Bolivar has 19,410 people who might know Jesus, 152,613 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11,577 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.
